# Publishers.BufferingStrategy.customError(_:)

**Case**

When the buffer is full, execute the closure to provide a custom error.

## Declaration

```swift
case customError(() -> Failure)
```

## Buffering strategies

- **Publishers.BufferingStrategy.dropNewest**: When the buffer is full, discard the newly received element.
- **Publishers.BufferingStrategy.dropOldest**: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.
